title.4: Power demand management is achievable with ManageON

titleDetail.1: In case of national power supply emergency, the electricity saved at the electricity consumption business contracted with the demand management operator according to the temporary request of the power exchange is returned to the company's profit.
titleDetail.2: It is a national power supply stabilization business that receives compensation through the power transaction market.

card1.detail: It is a national power supply stabilization business that receives compensation through the power transaction market by returning the electricity saved at the electricity consumption business contracted with the demand management operator according to the temporary request of the power exchange in case of national power supply emergency.

card2.title: Why is DR necessary?
card2.detail: It is a socially beneficial business that efficiently manages national power demand to promote 'power supply stabilization', induces rational 'energy consumption' of electricity consumers, avoids the construction of new power plants, preserves the environment through reduction of fine dust and greenhouse gases, and contributes to the creation of ICT convergence additional services.

card3.title: What are the participation criteria for DR?
card3.detail: Electricity consumption businesses that can reduce a certain amount of electricity that has been pre-contracted with the demand management operator (ManageON) in response to a reduction request from the power exchange can participate in the demand management business. Depending on the type of electricity consumption verification, they can participate as standard DR (large electricity consumption businesses) or small and medium-sized DR (small and medium-sized businesses).

title.3: per 1 kW of registered power capacity, depending on your annual participation rate.
title.4: Example) KRW 30,000,000 ~ KRW 50,000,000 annual settlement payment for 1,000 kW registration

detail.1: Peak values and contracted power are appropriate.
detail.2: The high-voltage A option 2 is the most suitable tariff, but if the peak can be lowered to the level of 2,354 kW, option 3 becomes more advantageous.
detail.3: The peak graph is maintained at the same level every year, and peak management in July and August is important.
detail.4: The load distribution by time of day is appropriate.

section6.title: Self-developed Solution
section6.detail: We provide a certified self-developed demand management and operation system.
section6.content: Manageon's demand management and operation system provides customers participating in demand management business with real-time power usage status, power reduction status, CBL information, reduction notifications, settlement details, and more through various methods such as PC and mobile web, smartphone applications, and other methods without spatial constraints. We provide services that respond in real-time to the reduction orders of the Korea Power Exchange, enabling customers to reduce their power consumption more quickly and safely.

section7.content: Manageon's demand management and operation system provides customers participating in demand management business with real-time power usage status, power reduction status, CBL information, reduction notifications, settlement details, and more through various methods such as PC and mobile web, smartphone applications, and other methods without spatial constraints. We provide services that respond in real-time to the reduction orders of the Korea Power Exchange, enabling customers to reduce their power consumption more quickly and safely.
section7.subContent: Automatically detects errors with the intelligent self-diagnosis (SSD, Smart Self-Diagnosis) function and responds immediately.
